ul was a zealous human worshipper of the Absolute who completed his pilgrimage to the Moonrise Towers during the late 15 century DR.
Sul was a common human man with bronze skin, dark brown curly hair, and hazel eyes. He had a mustache and a goatee and was dressed in a simple maroon tunic.
In the , Sul was among those who joined the new religions that sprang in the Western Heartlands. Like many others, Sul took on a pilgrimage to the seat of the Absolutes power – the Moonrise Towers – the fortress controlled by the Absolutes warlord – General Ketheric Thorm. When a group of True Soul heroes arrived at the Moonrise, Sul cheered for the moon-witchs arrival.
